title: Bread- A Baker's Book of Techniques and Recipes - Jeffrey Hamelm
description:
Bread: A Baker's Book of Techniques and Recipes
Author: Jeffrey Hamelman



When Bread was first published in 2004, it received the Julia Child Award for best First Book and became an instant classic. Hailed as a Ã¢â‚¬Å“masterwork of bread baking literature,Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½

Genre: Non Fiction | Food And Drink
